message: ZIO is a next-generation framework for building cloud-native applications on the JVM. With a beginner-friendly yet powerful functional core, ZIO lets developers quickly build best-practice applications that are highly scalable, testable, robust, resilient, resource-safe, efficient, and observable.

ZIO is used for building cloud-native applications on the JVM. It is a next-generation framework that lets developers quickly build best-practice applications that are highly scalable, testable, robust, resilient, resource-safe, efficient, and observable.
Referential transparency is a property of functions that allows them to be replaced with their corresponding values without changing the program's behavior.
A pure function is a function that has no side effects and always returns the same output given the same input.
